749622-Andrei_Massaini
1)
a.) C1,6 (1100(2)) = X(2)
1100(2) = 00001100
C1,6 (1100(2)) = 111100(2)

b.) C1,8 (1110(2)) = X(2)
1110(2) = 00001110
C1,8 (1110(2)) = 11110010(2)

c.) C2,6 (100101(2)) = X(2)
100101(2) = 100101(2)
C2,6 (100101(2)) = 011011(2)

d.) C2,7 (100101(2)) = X(2)
100101(2) = 0100101(2)
C2,7 (100101(2)) = 1011011(2)

e.) C2,8 (110101(2)) = X(2)
110101(2) = 0110101(2)
C2,8 (110101(2)) = 1001011(2)

2)

a.) C1,6 (132(4)) = X(2)
132(4) = 11010(2)
11010(2) = 011010(2)
C1,6 (132(4)) = 100110(2)

b.) C1,8 (4B(16)) = X(2)
4B(16) = 01001011(2)
01001011(2) = 01001011(2)
C1,8 (4B(16)) = 10110101(2)

c.) C2,6 (213(4)) = X(2)
213(4) = 1001011(2)
1001011(2) = 1001011(2)
C2,6 (213(4)) = 0110101(2)

d.) C2,10 (154(8)) = X(2)
154(8) = 1101010(2)
1101010(2) = 00001101010(2)
C2,10 (154(8)) = 11110010110(2)

e.) C2,8 (B8(16)) = X(2)
B8(16) = 10111000(2)
10111000(2) = 10111000(2)
C2,8 (B8(16)) = 01001000(2)


3)
a.) 10111(2) = X(10)
10111(2) = 01000(2) = +8(10)

b.) 110001(2) = X(10)
110001(2) = 001110(2) = +14(10)
c.) 100101(2) = X(2)
100101(2) = 011011(2) = +27(10)

d.) 1011101(2) = X(2)
1011101(2) = 0100011(2) = +35(10)

e.) 1010011(2) = X(16)
1010011(2) = 0101101(2) = +45(10)


4)
a.) 11101(2) - 1011(2) = X(2)
11101(2) - 01011(2) = 10010(2) = 18(10)

b.) 101,0101(2) - 10,11(2) = X(2)
1010101(2) - 0000101(2) = 1010000(2) = 40(10)

c.) 321(4) - 213(4) = X(4)
0321(4) - 0213(4) = 0104(4) = 22(10)

d.) 461(8) - 247(8) = X(8)
0461(8) - 0247(8) = 0214(8) = 140(10)

e.) 7C4(16) - B1D(16) = X(16)
07C4(16) - 0B1D(16) = 0109(16) = 265(10)


5)
a.) 110011(2) - 1101(2)
110011(2) - 001101(2) = 110011 - 001101 = 11000

b.) 101,1101(2) - 3,3(8)
1011101(2) - 0000011(8) = 1011101 - 0000011 = 10101010

c.) 231(4) - E(16)
10011(2) - 01110(2) = 10011 - 01110 = 00101

d.) D4(16) - 1011101(2)
11010100(2) - 1011101(2) = 11010100 - 1011101 = 01101011

e.) 67(10) - 3B(16)
01000011(2) - 00111011(2) = 01000011 - 00111011 = 10010100
